channel.title: cupcakes – Chow Down Orlando
channel.description: Exploring all that Orlando has to offer.

item.title: Yum Yum Cupcakes
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
Seriously, can you go wrong with The Yum Yum Cupcake Truck? I mean, we’ve talked about them before, and every time we go it’s delicious. Pictured here is the dark chocolate raspberry cupcake. And yes, it was as good as it looks. You can find, and you should, Yum Yum on Twitter.

The post Yum Yum Cupcakes appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Seriously, can you go wrong with The Yum Yum Cupcake Truck? I mean, we’ve talked about them before, and every time we go it’s delicious. Pictured here is the dark chocolate raspberry cupcake. And yes, it was as good as it looks.

item.title: Sweet! By Miss Holly

item.description:
We’ve posted about Sweet! By Miss Holly before, but it’s fitting to mention that one year ago she made our wedding cupcake cake from her out-of-this-world white raspberry cupcakes. This year we celebrated with eight minis, four white raspberry and the four pictured above. Pictured from top right going clockwise are Chocolate Mint, White Out, […]

The post Sweet! By Miss Holly appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
We’ve posted about Sweet! By Miss Holly before, but it’s fitting to mention that one year ago she made our wedding cupcake cake from her out-of-this-world white raspberry cupcakes. This year we celebrated with eight minis, four white raspberry and the four pictured above.

Pictured from top right going clockwise are Chocolate Mint, White Out, Creamsicle and Peppermint. Peppermint and Chocolate Mint are holiday flavors.

Sweet! By Miss Holly can be found in Waterford Lakes right next to TooJays.

The post Sweet! By Miss Holly appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: Yum Yum Cupcakes
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
Given that I am a huge fan of cupcakes and food trucks, the Yum Yum Cupcake Truck is right up my alley. Serving gourmet cupcakes where ever they are parked, Yum Yum offers a ton of delicious flavors. Pictured are Cookies Got Creamed, the harvest cupcake, red velvet and chocolate peanut butter. Cookies Got Creamed […]

The post Yum Yum Cupcakes appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Given that I am a huge fan of cupcakes and food trucks, the Yum Yum Cupcake Truck is right up my alley. Serving gourmet cupcakes where ever they are parked, Yum Yum offers a ton of delicious flavors.

Pictured are Cookies Got Creamed, the harvest cupcake, red velvet and chocolate peanut butter.

Cookies Got Creamed might be the best Oreo style cupcake I’ve ever had. It’s simply amazing. And the Oreo cooked into the bottom of the cake is a nice touch. The harvest cupcake is basically an apple pie baked into a cupcake. And it’s really freaking good.

Yum Yum is out almost every night and can be found by following their twitter account.

The post Yum Yum Cupcakes appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: Sweet! By Miss Holly
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
Dessert Time! There is one place in Orlando that Justin and I will always visit over and over and over again and that is Sweet! by Miss Holly. Her cupcakes are not only the best I have ever eaten (and that is a very true statement) they are also the most creative. Who new that […]

The post Sweet! By Miss Holly appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Dessert Time! There is one place in Orlando that Justin and I will always visit over and over and over again and that is Sweet! by Miss Holly. Her cupcakes are not only the best I have ever eaten (and that is a very true statement) they are also the most creative. Who new that one of my favorite cupcakes would be made of peanut butter and jelly? Another of my strange favorites would be her breakfast salmon cupcake.

In the picture are some of our afternoon cravings that Justin went and picked up mainly because we needed them. The big one in the middle is my personal favorite: white raspberry. This cupcake is soft and delicate with a surprise of raspberry jelly filling, the icing is covered in sugar crystals and completed with a raspberry jelly bean on top!

Surrounding the giant white raspberry are some of its closest friends: carrot cake, white out, cream-sickle, and peanut butter. 

We love Sweet! by Miss Holly so much, that we even had her make our wedding cupcakes!

The post Sweet! By Miss Holly appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
